rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000} and Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IDE2114})
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IDE2114})

description: This unit introduces the field of transportation design including materials technology, ergonomics, future trends and external influences, and transportation design history. Project work will be undertaken using the appropriate drawing and rendering techniques to initiate and present transportation concepts.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
